channel.title: 1 on Victor A. Ying
channel.description: Recent content in 1 on Victor A. Ying

item.title: Harmonizing Speculative and Non-Speculative Execution in Architectures for Ordered Parallelism
item.description: Extending Swarm’s hardware and software mechanisms to enable speculative and non-speculative tasks to coordinate on shared data structures, to enable unrestricted tasks, and to allow expert programmers to safely implement efficient and scalable system services, such as memory allocation, within speculative tasks, improving performance by up to 69×.

item.title: Fractal: An Execution Model for Fine-Grain Nested Speculative Parallelism
item.description: A new execution model that enhances the Swarm hardware architecture, a general-purpose multicore architecture that makes it easy to exploit more parallelism in many applications. Outperforms prior systems by up to 88×.
